all: Experience serving as a business analyst on data management projects

jd:
BA4 - Enterprise Data Warehouse Project - Nukasanigroup Inc.

About the Company

Nukasanigroup Inc. is a talent acquisition firm.

Job Overview

Senior Business Analyst will support DBHDS' project to design and implement a new Enterprise Data Warehouse (EDW) and data exchange.

Location and Work Arrangement

Richmond, VA, Hybrid

Key Responsibilities

  • Coordinate extensively with internal and external stakeholders to gather and document business and technical requirements.
  • Analyze business needs and document the data to be ingested into the new data platform.
  • Create data dictionaries with input from data stewards.
  • Meet with stakeholders to document report requirements.
  • Oversee quality assurance processes to ensure that the delivered solutions meet business requirements.

Required Qualifications

  • 8 Years of Analytical skills
  • 8 Years of Communication skills
  • 8 Years of Interpersonal skills
  • 8 Years of Business acumen
  • 8 Years of Organizational and time management skills
  • 8 Years of Adaptability and continuous learning
  • 8 Years of Customer service orientation
  • 4 Years of experience serving as a business analyst on data management projects
  • 4 Years of SQL querying skills

Preferred Qualifications

  • 2 Years of Familiarity with healthcare data

What We Offer

Best competitive rate.

How to Apply

Please send your updated word resume and candidate submission format details.
